successes.title: Rachel & the TreeSchoolers- Too Educational for TV?
successes.description: Rachel & the TreeSchoolers: A PhD backed children's series, delivered in 12 musical episodes. Brought to you by YOU!

Pledges.description: JUST HERE TO HELP: You might not have kids. You might not even like kids. But if you did, you'd like smart TV. You love that warm, fuzzy feeling of doing good and making a difference don't you? That's reward enough :)
*Early Bird* DIGITAL PACK: SHOWS + MUSIC & ACTIVITY GUIDES (pdf) of each episode funded in this campaign. Delivered digitally ASAP via Platform Purple. Oh, yes you do!
DIGITAL PACK: SHOWS + MUSIC & ACTIVITY GUIDES (pdf) of each episode funded in this campaign. Delivered digitally ASAP via Platform Purple. Go you!

*Early Bird* TreeSchoolers DELUXE: Episodes 7, 8, & 9 DVDs & CDs SHIPPED + AUTOGRAPH + DIGITAL PACK. Details: 1 DVD will be AUTOGRAPHED by Rachel. Includes each DIGITAL episode funded in this campaign.

TreeSchoolers DELUXE: Episodes 7, 8, & 9 DVDs & CDs SHIPPED + AUTOGRAPH + DIGITAL PACK. Details: 1 DVD will be AUTOGRAPHED by Rachel. Includes each DIGITAL episode funded in this campaign. Awesome-Sauce!

COME BACK PACK DIGITAL: Episodes 4, 5, 6, 7, 8, & 9 DIGITAL episodes + any additional episodes funded in this campaign + MUSIC + ACTIVITY GUIDES (pdf) via Platform Purple. Remember that time you Backed us in 2013?

PERSONALIZED VIDEO MESSAGE + TreeSchoolers DELUXE: You will receive a 10-20 second personalized video message for your child. Have you ever wished Rachel Coleman was there to tell them it's bedtime, or congratulate them for staying in their big boy/girl bed all night long? Now I can! Delivered digitally. Messages need to be within good taste. Includes TreeSchoolers DELUXE. Good job staying dry!

SUPER-FAN REWARD: 4 SIGNING TIME DVDs of your choice* + EVERYTHING in the TreeSchoolers DELUXE Reward (above). Details: You get 4 DVDs of your choice (*choose a total of 4 DVDs from any of the following collections: Signing Time, Potty Time and Baby Signing Time) PLUS get the TreeSchooler DELUXE Reward. More than one shipment. You are super super!

TreeSchoolers COLLECTION DIGITAL: Episodes 1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6, 7, 8 & 9 (and any others that get funded in this campaign!!!)  Details: You get at least 9 TreeSchoolers DIGITAL episodes + MUSIC + ACTIVITY GUIDES delivered via Platform Purple. No shipping. Let's get digital!

COME BACK PACK: Episodes 4, 5, 6, 7, 8, & 9 DVDs & CDs SHIPPED + DIGITAL episodes + MUSIC + ACTIVITY GUIDES via Platform Purple. Details: 1 DVD will be AUTOGRAPHED by Rachel. (More than one shipment) Awwww! You came back to Back us!

PERSONALIZED SIGNING TIME THEME SONG + TreeSchoolers DELUXE: You will receive the Signing Time Theme song recorded with your Child(ren)'s name! You know you sing it that way already, now I'll make it "official!" 1 or 2 names can be sung.  Delivered digitally. Includes TreeSchoolers DELUXE. "It's Signing Time with Aiden and Maddie!"

TreeSchoolers COLLECTION DVDs & CDs SHIPPED + DIGITAL: Episodes 1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6, 7, 8 & 9 (and any other DIGITAL episodes that get funded in this campaign!!!) Details: You get at least 9 TreeSchoolers DVDs (1 is AUTOGRAPHED), and CDs plus the DIGITAL episodes + MUSIC + ACTIVITY GUIDES via Platform Purple. (More than one shipment) HOLY COW! That's a lot of stuff!

SKYPE: You're getting a "face-to-face" SKYPE video call with me, Rachel Coleman and everything in the TreeSchoolers DELUXE. You and I will SKYPE for up to 20 minutes. Note: Calls will be scheduled within 9 months. See you soon!

*Early Bird* YOUR CHILD IN OUR SHOW - SALT LAKE CITY, UT + CONCERT TICKETS: Your child will be filmed for this project. Our director spends up to 45 minutes working with your child to capture great footage. We'll film up to two siblings per reward slot. (At least one sibling must be age 1-10.) You will meet me, RACHEL COLEMAN. Filming of this Reward takes place in the SALT LAKE CITY, UT area on SEPTEMBER 5th or 6th. Those filmed will be NAMED in the CREDITS. We will do everything we can to include your child in the final program. On occasion a child is uncooperative in spite of our best efforts (and that of their parents) Note: your travel and expenses are not included. Includes TreeSchoolers DELUXE + up to 4 tickets to the Signing Time Concert in SALT LAKE CITY, UT on SEPTEMBER 5th or 6th, 2014.

We'll film up to two siblings per reward slot. Ages 1-10. You will meet me, RACHEL COLEMAN. Filming takes place in the SALT LAKE CITY, UT area on SEPTEMBER 5th or 6th. Those filmed will be NAMED in the CREDITS. We will do everything we can to include your child in the final program. On occasion a child is uncooperative in spite of our best efforts (and that of their parents) Note: your travel and expenses are not included. Includes TreeSchoolers DELUXE + up to 4 tickets to the Signing Time Concert in SALT LAKE CITY, UT on SEPTEMBER 5th or 6th, 2014.

Those filmed will be NAMED in the CREDITS. We will do everything we can to include your child in the final program. On occasion a child is uncooperative in spite of our best efforts (and that of their parents) Note: your travel and expenses are not included. Includes TreeSchoolers DELUXE Reward. Check your calendar and pencil me in the morning or afternoon of MONDAY, JUNE 30, 2014. Note: your travel and expenses are not included, but neither are mine. Reserved for the wicked smart!

ON-SCREEN DEDICATION + YOUR CHILD IN OUR SHOW: An on-screen dedication in one of these shows to whomever you choose. "Dedicated to..." or "In memory of..." There is one dedication per episode. Includes YOUR CHILD IN OUR SHOW Reward (choose from above locations) ~ I dedicate this reward to you!

YOUR CHILD(REN) FILMED ON SET - SALT LAKE CITY, UT: Your child(ren) will be filmed on our professional set for this project. They will experience HAIR, MAKEUP and WARDROBE! Your family is invited on-set to see BEHIND THE SCENES and to watch as I FILM A SONG. You'll HAVE LUNCH with me and the crew! The VIP on-set experience will be in SALT LAKE CITY, Utah. Includes TreeSchoolers DELUXE! Note: your travel and expenses are not included. This reward is for your immediate family, no exceptions please. Shoot dates will likely be scheduled in SEPTEMBER, NOVEMBER and DECEMBER 2014.

YOUR CHILD IN OUR SHOW - PARIS, FRANCE - JULY 2014: Your child will be directed by me, Rachel Coleman and we will spends up to 45 minutes working with your child to capture great footage. We'll film up to two siblings per reward slot. Ages 1-10. Filming takes place in Paris, FRANCE on TUESDAY, JULY 15, or WEDNESDAY, JULY 16, 2014. Those filmed will be NAMED in the CREDITS. We will do everything we can to include your child in the final program. On occasion a child is uncooperative in spite of our best efforts (and that of their parents). TreeSchoolers DELUXE is included! Note: your travel and expenses are not included.  Bon jour! Une croque madame s'il vous pla√Æt?

YOUR CHILD IN OUR SHOW - LONDON, ENGLAND - JULY 2014: Your child will be directed by me, Rachel Coleman and we will spends up to 45 minutes working with your child to capture great footage. We'll film up to two siblings per reward slot. Ages 1-10. Filming takes place in London, ENGLAND JULY 2nd or 17th. Those filmed will be NAMED in the CREDITS. We will do everything we can to include your child in the final program. On occasion a child is uncooperative in spite of our best efforts (and that of their parents). TreeSchoolers DELUXE is included! Note: your travel and expenses are not included. Perhaps we'll have tea and crumpets!

EXECUTIVE PRODUCER CREDIT + YOUR CHILD IN OUR SHOW: Yes, you too can be an Executive Producer... or your child can! You'll be in good company, listed with my dad - Lex de Azevedo, my sister - Emilie Brown, & me - Rachel Coleman on one of these new shows. Includes YOUR CHILD IN OUR SHOW Reward. We are family!

PHOTOSYNTHESIS PUPPET + YOUR CHILD IN OUR SHOW: You will receive THE original, one-of-a-kind "PHOTOSYNTHESIS" Flower Hand Puppet and YOUR CHILD IN OUR SHOW Reward (choose from available locations above!)

ORIGINAL SIGNING TIME "RACHEL" JACKET XS + YOUR CHILD IN OUR SHOW: You will receive an original, Signing Time Jacket (Size XS fits child size 4-9) and YOUR CHILD IN OUR SHOW Reward (choose from available locations above!)

SIGNING TIME CONCERT + YOUR CHILD IN OUR SHOW: Rachel  & Hopkins in an hour long concert, plus meet & greet, photo-op and autographs. You set up the venue. Schedule up to 18 months out. We'll very likely film you when we come for the concert. PLUS you'll get the YOUR CHILD IN OUR SHOW Reward! Continental US only. Please contact us directly for AK, HI and International requests.

SIGNING TIME BIRTHDAY with RACHEL + YOUR CHILD IN OUR SHOW: I'm coming to your party! Includes up to 2.5 hours at your party. I'll bring temporary tattoos, stickers and more. Schedule up to 18 months out. Includes YOUR CHILD IN OUR SHOW Reward! La-di-da-di Happy Birthday! Note: This is not a concert. Continental US only. Please contact us directly for AK, HI and International requests.

YOUR PEEPS IN OUR SHOW (ANYWHERE, CONTINENTAL USA): Your group of up to 20 children, in 10 time slots, will be filmed for THIS project and we are coming to YOU for a full day shoot. Our director spends up to 45 minutes with each group of 2 to capture great footage. Ages 1-10. You will meet me, RACHEL COLEMAN and have LUNCH with the CREW. Filming takes place WHERE YOU SAY on dates to be determined. We will give you at least 60 days notice of shoot date. Filming will take place within the next 3-18 months. Those filmed will be NAMED in the CREDITS. We will do everything we can to include your child in the final program. On occasion a child is uncooperative in spite of our best efforts (and that of their parents) Includes: TreeSchoolers DELUXE Reward for 20 + PLUSH HOPKINS for 20. Continental US only. Please contact us directly for AK, HI and International requests.
